mapper.select: select count(0) from t_goods t where t.delete_status=0 and t.goods_name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

select t.id id, t.goods_code goodsCode, t.goods_name goodsName, t.status status, t.goods_url goodsUrl, t.goods_desc goodsDesc, t.supplier_id supplierId, t.price price, t.sale_price salePrice, t.grade_id gradeId, t.subject_id subjectId, g.name gradeName, s.name subjectName from t_goods t left join t_grade g on g.id=t.grade_id left join t_subject s on s.id=t.subject_id where t.delete_status=0 and t.goods_name like concat('%',#{name},'%') order by id limit #{offset},#{pageRow}
